name: The 4th Int'l Symposium on Nuclear Science and Applications
content: The 4th Int'l Symposium on Nuclear Science and Applications (SNSA 2024) will be held from August 9-11, 2024 in Chengdu, China. This Conference will cover issues on Nuclear Science and Applications. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods. SNSA 2024 will be an important and reliable platform for inspiring international and interdisciplinary exchange at the forefront of Nuclear Science and Applications. The Conference will bring together academicians, engineers, educators and policy-makers from all over the world, and we hope that you will take this opportunity to join us for academic exchange and visit the city of Chengdu.
